resources.string: This activity contains playable sounds of each guitar chord. On the left side a tab for chord is presented - it shows which strings on which frets should be pressed in order to play a chord. On the right side there is a play button - when clicked it plays a recording of a corresponding chord. Example : A major chord. \nLibraries : MediaPlayer. \nMusic source : Author Recordings - available in resource files in raw

This activity contains player which allows to select an mp3 file located on your mobile and play it. Files are added via search for audiofiles across the phone. Buttons allow to make the following actions with current recording - play, forward, pause or stop. \nLibraries : MediaPlayer
